How these files and folders work:
------------------------------------


Direction / Pixels / hex:

* Direction means the direction the pointy bit of the arrow points
* Pixels means the amount of pixels between the flat back of the arrow and the pointy front
* hex means the hex code of the arrow in question

Example:

/down/3/666666.gif

A down-pointing 3 pixel tall grey arrow, hex colour of "#666666".
